channel.title: Data Sources on Databricks Terraform Provider
channel.description: Recent content in Data Sources on Databricks Terraform Provider

item.title: zones
item.description: Data Source: databricks_zones This data source allows you to fetch all available availability zones on your aws workspace. This is only available on an AWS workspace. Example Usage data "databricks_zones" "zones" {} Argument Reference The are no arguments to this data source and only attributes that are computed. Attribute Reference In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported: - id: The id for the zone object.
